text:
Keep your unit size boring.

If the stake changes because of emotion, the edge is already gone.

Line shopping is the easiest long-term win.

Same bet + better price = higher EV. Do it every time.

Your opinion doesnâ€™t matter nearly as much as your price.

A good pick at a bad number is still a bad bet.

Before you tail a move, ask why it moved.

News? Liquidity? Or just public money? Context matters.

Want a cleaner breakdown before you bet?

Daily matchup angles are live on Parlay Gorilla.
Reminder: sports betting involves risk. 21+ only. If you or someone you know has a problem, call 1-800-GAMBLER.
